content.query:
create view jpmia.vw_top_companies_with_more_jobs as
with numb_jobs as 
(
select  distinct comp.company_id, comp.name as company_name, 
        experience_level,
        count(job_id) over(partition by comp.name, jobs.experience_level ORDER by comp.name) number_of_jobs_exp_level ,
        count(job_id) over(partition by comp.name order by comp.name) total_number_of_jobs
from jpmia.DimCompanies comp 
join jpmia.FactJobPostings jobs
    on comp.company_id = jobs.company_id


),
rank_comp AS
(
    select *, DENSE_RANK() over(order by total_number_of_jobs desc) as ranks
    from numb_jobs
)
select * from rank_comp 
where ranks <= 10
